E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/29/1977
Subject: Progress of Dave Righetti
Dear Sir,
Dave Righetti has nothing more to prove at A Wisconsin Rapids Twins!
He has an ERA of 3.28 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
